p: The two authors independently extracted and proofread the titles and abstracts of each article. The inclusion criteria were the effects of volatile oils and the active components of traditional Chinese medicine on inflammatory diseases, including in vivo and in vitro models and the possible mechanisms of action. The authors excluded articles based on the following criteria: review articles, meta-analyses, abstracts, editorials/letters, conference proceedings, case reports, studies in humans, and articles published more than 5 years ago. The differences of opinion between the two authors were independently decided by the third author.
